tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_incident_audit_log (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_type TEXT,
  date TIMESTAMP,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50),
  incident_time TIMESTAMP,
  details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    date_logged TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    user_id UUID,
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE security_incident_logs (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    event_type TEXT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    password TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    role TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_activity_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    activity_type TEXT,
    description TEXT
);
